## WritableData type

The `WritableData` type represents different types of data that can be written. The data can either be a uniform ArrayLike collection or a single value of the following types:

- `Point`<!-- -->: Represents a [Point](./influxdb3-client.point.md) object.

- `string`<!-- -->: Represents lines of the [Line Protocol](https://bit.ly/2QL99fu)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type WritableData = ArrayLike<string> | ArrayLike<Point> | string | Point;
```
**References:** [Point](./influxdb3-client.point.md)
